string.value: I brought the necklace back to Tatamo, the chief of Leafre. He looked at the picture inscribed on the #o8180001#'s necklace, and said that since #b#p1061012##k knows about Sayram, I should go show him the necklace. Off I go! \n\n#i4031467##t4031467# #b#c4031467#/1
On Chief Tatamo's recommendation, I spoke with #p1061012#, who knew about the necklace and the Singing Shield. I must ask him for more information about the shield!

I remembered the necklace that you showed me before.I am sure that it is the one that Griffey got from #bSayram#k. I'm surprised the necklace is still with Griffey... Hoho.. Now, are you all done here?

Ah. You asked me about a singing shield. This necklace doesn't remind me of anything, but I know someone who knows more about Sayram. Show the necklace to him... What was his name...? I'm not sure, but #bhe's insignificant#k.
maybe, you can find some clue from the necklace. I'm not sure though. Hohoho. The necklace? Sayram released #o8180001# on the forest later. I think #b#o8180001##k in #bMinar forest#k would have it.
Phew... I doubt if I have a body.... Huh? Who are you? Do you want to see this #p1061012#?
Hmm. You came here to ask about this necklace. Certainly, humans don't use this. Who wears this? I think I've seen it.
Having trouble? Well, I can't remember his name. Anyhow, #bhe's an insignificant being!#k
What can I do to help you without clues?
How could you lose the necklace? It's a nice necklace although it was held by Griffey~ Luckily, a kind traveler brought it to me.
